wrapperr_customize.wrapperr_front_page_title: Did you get that thing from Spotify and wondered what your Plex statistics looked like?
wrapperr_customize.stats_intro_subtitle: New year, new page of statistics. {current_year} let's go...
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_subtitle: You watched {movie_count} movies. That's a lot of movies!
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_subsubtitle: (or not, I am pre-programmed to say that)
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_subtitle_one: You watched one movie. You know what you like!
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_subtitle_none: You watched no movies. That's impressive in itself!
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_movie_completion_ti: Your average movie finishing percentage was {movie_finish_percent}%!
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_movie_completion_su: You're not watching the credits like a nerd, are you?
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_pause_title: Your longest movie pause was watching {movie_title}.
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_pause_title_one: One movie, but you still had to pause it.
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_pause_subtitle_none: You never paused a single movie.
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_oldest_title: The oldest movie you watched was {movie_title}.
wrapperr_customize.get_user_movie_stats_oldest_subtitle_pre: I didn't even know they made movies back then...
Was it a 4K, UHD, 3D, Dolby Atmos remaster?
wrapperr_customize.get_user_show_stats_subsubtitle: (no, watching The Office twice doesn't count as two shows)
wrapperr_customize.get_user_show_stats_subsubtitle_one: (better not be that same one again...)
wrapperr_customize.get_user_show_stats_subtitle_none: You watched 0 shows. I get it, it's not for everyone!
wrapperr_customize.get_user_show_stats_most_played_title: You really liked the episode {show_episode} from {show_title}.
wrapperr_customize.get_user_show_stats_most_played_subtitle: It recieved {episode_play_sum} and was endured for {episode_duration_sum}.
wrapperr_customize.get_user_show_stats_buddy_title: Your top show was {top_show_title}. And you're not alone! Your {top_show_title}-buddy is {buddy_username}!
wrapperr_customize.get_user_show_stats_buddy_subtitle: Your combined efforts resulted in {buddy_duration_sum} of {top_show_title}!
wrapperr_customize.get_user_show_stats_buddy_subtitle_none: That means you dared to explore where no one else would, as you are the only viewer of that show. Spread the word!
wrapperr_customize.get_user_music_stats_subtitle_none: You listened to 0 tracks. No speakers, huh?
wrapperr_customize.get_user_music_stats_oldest_album_title: The oldest album you listened to was {album_title} by {album_artist}.
wrapperr_customize.get_user_music_stats_oldest_album_subtit: How about a copy on vinyl?
wrapperr_customize.get_year_stats_subtitle: It's okay to feel shame if you see yourself on the list.
wrapperr_customize.get_year_stats_movies_duration_title: All users combined spent {movie_duration_sum} watching movies.
wrapperr_customize.get_year_stats_shows_duration_title: All users combined spent {show_duration_sum} watching shows.
wrapperr_customize.get_year_stats_music_duration_title: All users combined spent {music_duration_sum} listening to music.
